concept.title: Assignments
concept.shortdesc: The syllabus should explain all policies about the submission and grading of assignments.

conbody.p:
The relevant information for assignment policies could be included as a subsection to the policies section and should include:
A brief statement of assignment types in the class
Subsections that explain your policies about the submission and grading of assignments

example.title: Example
example.p: In addition to reading assignments (discussed in the Schedule section), there are quizzes/tests, projects, papers, workshops, and exercises that you must submit for a grade or completion credit (discussed in the Grading section).
